title: BIFLE User
description: BIFLE User app connects shippers or consignees with carriers all over Ethiopia and across the border, to and from Djibouti. The app allows users to easily view the estimated fare of their loads, book and track their shipments. Features include real-time tracking, easy load search and booking, past transaction history, driver picture and review, and notifications for pickup and drop-off.

title: BIFLE Driver
description: BIFLE Driver app allows truck drivers to accept orders and earn money. Drivers can receive notifications for new orders, accept orders, view past booked history, view pickup and drop-off locations. A companion app to BIFLE User that completes the logistics platform for the Ethiopian freight market.

title: Tamworth '24
description: The must-have app for anyone attending the Tamworth Country Music Festival in Australia. Discover, plan, and immerse yourself in live performances, events, and the rich cultural tapestry of this iconic festival. Features include festival schedule, artist bios & performance details, venue maps, photo gallery, and personalised schedule with My Fest bookmarking.

title: BRAC Fleet
description: iFleet / BRAC Fleet provides an easy-to-use platform to manage vehicles over their entire lifecycle — administration, financial controlling, fuel consumption reports, vehicle and driver records. The digital logbook allows users to give requisitions for any vehicle, track location, see driver details and vehicle information in real-time with 30-second update intervals.

title: Realty Pro Shots
fullTitle: Realty Pro Shots — Camera App (React Native)
description: Professional real estate photography app for iOS and Android. Captures 5 photos of varying exposure levels — the team of editors then combines each one to deliver an amazingly clear, crisp HDR photo. Perfect for real estate agents, remodelers, interior designers, and builders looking to take their real estate photography to the next level.

title: Beautysiaa
description: Beautysiaa is a leading e-commerce app for cosmetics and skincare products in Bangladesh. The app offers a curated selection of authentic international skincare and makeup products. Features include live streaming with live notifications, dark mode, WhatsApp integration, and a seamless shopping experience from Bangladesh's most trusted online beauty shop.

title: Hillive
description: Hillive is a live video broadcasting app that makes it incredibly easy to start broadcasting in one click. Supports group broadcasting, audience-side audio conferences, and real-time interactive streaming for social engagement.

title: Quality Foods
description: Quality Integrated Agro (QIAL) mobile app for ordering high-quality processed poultry, meat, and egg products. The app ensures proper quality checks at each stage — from farm to table — with Halal slaughtering and HACCP protocols. Users can browse products, place orders, and get fast delivery of authentic quality foods.

title: QIL Sales
fullTitle: QIL Sales — Sales Management App (React Native)
description: QIL Sales is an internal sales management app for Quality Integrated Agro Ltd. The app enables the sales team to manage orders, track deliveries, and monitor sales performance across the organisation's supply chain — from farm to retail.

title: Pujam Pandal
description: Puja Event Management Software. Features include Auctions, Bidding, Pandal Donation, Pandal Creation, and Community Posts for pandal events.

title: Vip Satta
description: A gaming application built with Native Android, featuring real-time bidding and gaming mechanics.

title: MyC2i
description: This app mainly works related to Islamic dawat. It deals with nearby mosques and various Islamic hadiths, dawat-related discussions. Users can donate to specific mosques or madrasas.

title: eDoctor
description: This project is an Android Mobile Application which allows users to obtain information about doctors. The app can also save all information related to the treatment of patients.

title: PIMIS
fullTitle: Patient's Integrated Medical Info System (Native Android)
description: An Android Mobile Application which allows users to obtain information about doctors and hospitals nearby. The app saves all information related to patient treatment history.

title: Summary
description: A web development project showcasing modern frontend techniques and responsive design.

title: Finance
description: A finance management web application with dashboard and data visualization features.
